timeline.message: Add functionality for retrieving content size to external content handler, use this value during creation and replacement of binaries. Reenable some of the external binary tests not related to copying or want-digest, add a few more tests, DRY up some components.
Reenable tests related to want-digest with external binaries, and a few other tests that use externals
Implement transmission fixity for external binaries. Add tests for transmission fixity, updating, and deleting external binaries.
Update service tests for external binaries. Move external binary copy operation into services
Make external uri validation case sensitive, aside from the scheme portion
Specify accept encoding when getting info about http external binaries so that we don't get the compressed content-length

timeline.bodyText:
It seems like this can potentially return null.
..although, unlikely. I am not sure there is an actual pathway for the uri to be null. We are just doing lots of extra null checking elsewhere.
timeline.author: awoods

replies.bodyText: yeah, I can add in a null check for safety reasons, but i'm pretty sure the validator that gets run before this catches the case of the link not being set.
